column2: The council of [From.GetTitledName] is shown below.

The following honorary titles have important effects:

* Designated regent
* Designated heir (patrician)
* Despot
* Chief Qadi
* Court Guru

A character might have multiple heirs due to:

* Dynasty losing election (feudal or patrician)
*Kingdom or higher titles with different succession laws
* Gavelkind
* Viceroyalty reverting to liege
